ygData.subject: RE: Red Headband Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Well after many hours in Paw, I have done this quest.  You just have to keep killing Ren Rexx eventually phido does spawn.... The other two heads come from
ygData.messageBody:
Well after many hours in Paw, I have done this quest. You just have to keep
killing Ren'Rexx eventually phido does spawn.... The other two heads come
from Ghanex Drah who is a normal spawn, and the third comes from killing
High Shaman Grisok who is a random spawn for Shaman Lenrel...
I got Ghanex Drah's head easily, it took around 7 hours (non-consecitvly) of
fighting till I got the other two heads, as a coincidence both Grisok and
Phido spawned at the same time (was killing all three in a circle)

Wade
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Woomer [mailto:dwoomer@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 5:34 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Red Headband Quest


From: "Dave Woomer" <dwoomer@...>

Hello, brothers and sisters...

Just spent a long, frustrating night in Paw trying to get the head of Dareb.
I've heard you get this item from High Shaman Phido, who is a rare spawn,
who shows up in place of Shaman Ren'Rexx on occasion. Well, I killed Ren'Rex
so many times I started feeling sorry for him <g>. Does anyone know who to
get the head of Dareb? After questing for the headband items for weeks, I
don't feel bad about a spoiler at this point <g>

Thanks!
